# vDSP_zrdesampD

**Function**

Performs complex-real double-precision FIR filtering with decimation and antialiasing.

## Declaration

```swift
extern void vDSP_zrdesampD(const DSPDoubleSplitComplex * __A, vDSP_Stride __DF, const double * __F, const DSPDoubleSplitComplex * __C, vDSP_Length __N, vDSP_Length __P);
```

## Discussion

This is the same as [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_zrdesamp], except for the types of vectors `A`, `F`, and `C`.

## Complex Vectors

- **vDSP_zrdesamp**: Performs complex-real single-precision FIR filtering with decimation and antialiasing.
